headline: Biden Shows Signs Improvement Bout Covid 19
summary: Kevin O'Connell, the physician of President Joe Biden,saidSunday thatBiden's COVID-19 symptoms "continue to improve significantly" after three days of Paxlovid treatment for the BA.5 variant.The presidenttested positive on Thursdayafter giving aspeech about climate changein Massachusetts. White House COVID Coordinator Ashish Jha said Sunday that none of the 17 people who came in close contact with Biden, including First Lady Jill Biden, have contracted the virus.  Jha also stated that Biden had an upper respiratory infection, and O'Connell also said that Biden is not experiencing shortness of breath. Biden has been vaccinated and twice boosted, and iscurrently isolating in the White Houseuntil Tuesday, pending a negative COVID-19 test.Biden's bout with the illness has been covered prominently across the political spectrum. Some right-rated sources, like Breitbart and Fox News, focused more onBiden's continued health symptomsand how the health of former Presidents was covered.
